instruction: Why those ads for mobile games aren't illegal
reference:
The copyright holder (The company that makes or distributes The Witcher) would need to make a claim to the picture/icon.

It is technically illegal.  It sounds like this game/company is committing copyright infringement.
System A:
Mobile users can opt out of seeing irrelevant or pesky ad promotions, and they have the option to use browser extensions that block them.

Pupil 2: Do you see the logic? These mobile game companies are in a win-win situation. If their ads promote engaging features like daily rewards or challenges, players are more likely to download and play the game. They also make money from the game itself through in-app purchases and advertising revenue.

Teacher 1: That's right! By taking an age targeted view on how mobile g
System B: It depends on the country you are in. In some countries, it is illegal to display ads for mobile games that target children under the age of 13. However, in other countries, it is not illegal to display ads for mobile games if they are not targeted at children. It is important to check the laws in your country before displaying ads for mobile games.
distractor: System A has been all around Europe two times.

instruction: Why those ads for mobile games aren't illegal
reference:
